meanings.definition: A place equipped for physical exercise.
meanings.sent1: Many people go to gyms to stay healthy and fit.
meanings.sent2: My favorite gym has a variety of equipment for workouts.
meanings.sent3: I tried doing cartwheels in the gym, but I just ended up dizzy!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a gym, where she trained her thoughts to be strong and resilient.
meanings.sent5: The gym was filled with the sound of weights clanking and people cheering each other on.

meanings.definition: A building or room used for indoor sports or physical training.
meanings.sent1: The school gym is where we have our basketball games.
meanings.sent2: We rented out the gym for our dance practice.
meanings.sent3: The gym was so crowded that it felt like a party in there!
meanings.sent4: His heart raced as he entered the gym, ready to give his all in the match.
meanings.sent5: The gym smelled of sweat and determination, a place where champions were made.
